"ガーディンのフレームの調達":
"What's this about an underground tunnel
on Lillipa? I can't imagine there's
anything there you could rightfully call
ingredients for cooking... But there
might be something to use for cooking
just the same! Those Guardines look like
little coffee makers! Bring me some of
their extra sturdy frames, ok?

※ Cae de Nv.31+ Guardines."
